column1: Canon '''Adam Fox''' ([[15 July]] [[1883]] â€“ [[17 January]] [[1977]]) was a fellow [[Inklings
column2: Inkling]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He was the Dean of Divinity at [[C.S. Lewis]]'s Magdalen College, Oxford. Between 1938 and 1942 he was Professor of Poetry. Later he became Canon of Westminster Abbey and he is buried there in the Poets' Corner.
